text: KQST (102.9 FM, "Q102.9") is a radio station broadcasting a Top 40 format. Licensed to Sedona, Arizona, United States, the station serves the Flagstaff, Arizona, area. The station is currently owned by Yavapai Broadcasting Corporation. ==Yavapai Broadcasting== In August 2004, W. Grant Hafley, owner of Yavapai Broadcasting, reached an agreement to acquire KQST for a reported $3 million. ==Station Ownership== *1984 - 1988 ARIZONA MEDIACOMM also owned sister KAZM-AM *1988 - 2004 ROCKET RADIO CORPORATION also owned sister stations KAZM-AM and KLOD-FM (now KVNA-FM) *2004 - Current YAVAPAI BROADCASTING currently owns KVNA-AM, KVNA-FM, KVRD-FM, KKLD-FM, KYBC-AM ==References== ==External links== * QST Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in Arizona
title: KQST
